content: and continue on 60 sts throughout round 11 *2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around 72 single_crochet round 12 work 1 round even join with slip_stitch at end of round - 48 60 72 single_crochet note from this point on join with slip_stitch at end of ea round and chain up to height of next round as instructed round 13 chain 2 work 1 half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 - 48 60 72 half_double_crochet round 14 chain 3 work 1 double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 - 48 60 72 double_crochet note for 2-color hat join contrast color at this point drop old color and carry up loosely inside hat until needed again round 15 cross stitch round chain 4 skip next double_crochet work double_crochet in next double_crochet reach back into skipped st and work double_crochet in that double_crochet cross stitch group completed *skip next double_crochet work double_crochet in next double_crochet work double_crochet into skipped double_crochet cross stitch group completed repeat from * around working last double_crochet around 2 beg chain to form last cross stitch group join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 - 24 30 36 cross stitch groups note if there is 1 stitch remaining unworked at end of round before joining skip it and work last double_crochet around beg chain-4 to form last cross stitch group note for 2-color hat change to main color drop contrast color and carry up loosely inside hat until needed again round 16 chain 3 work double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch - 48 60 72 double_crochet note for 2-color hat change to contrast color drop main color and carry up loosely inside hat until needed again round 17 repeat round 15 - 24 30 36 cross stitch groups note for 2-color hat change to main color cut contrast color leaving 6 tail to weave in later round 18 repeat round 16 - 48 60 72 double_crochet round 19 chain 2 work half_double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch - 48 60 72 half_double_crochet round 20 chain 1 work single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch - 48 60 72 single_crochet note for large size additional rounds of single_crochet can be worked at this point until hat is desired length finishing work 1 round slip_stitch loosely in ea single_crochet around cut yarn fasten_off and weave in ends copyright 2017 2004 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
